events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and are excited to review your qualifications.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the Software Development team.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps.
You successfully completed the initial screening call with our recruiter, where we discussed your experience and motivation.
Thank you for your prompt response and enthusiasm after the initial screening; we're moving forward with your application.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team members.
You completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th, where we will discuss company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview positively, showing a great fit with our company's values and team spirit.
We have extended an official offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
We received your feedback regarding the offer and you have expressed excitement and acceptance of the terms.
You accepted the job offer officially, and we are thrilled to welcome you to the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to necessary tools and introductory meetings with your team.
The hiring process is now completed successfully with your official start date confirmed and all paperwork finalized.
